errors.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to sign in. Please check your credentials or contact support.
errors.callbackDesc: There was a problem during the authentication callback. Please try again.
errors.configurationDesc: There is a problem with the server configuration. Please contact support if this persists.
errors.defaultDesc: An unexpected error occurred during authentication. Please try again.
errors.emailCreateAccountDesc: Could not create your account. Please try a different email address.
errors.oauthCallbackDesc: There was a problem with the authentication process. Please try signing in again.
errors.oauthCreateAccountDesc: Could not create your account. You may already have an account with this email.
errors.oauthSigninDesc: There was a problem signing in with your social account. Please try again.
errors.restartProcessDesc: The authentication process needs to be restarted. Please try signing in again from the beginning.
errors.verificationDesc: Please check your email to verify your account before signing in.

magicLink.emailSentMessage: We've sent a magic link to {email}. Click the link to sign in.
magicLink.title: Check your email

signIn.description: Enter your email for a magic link or sign in with Google
signIn.title: Sign In

cancelSubscription.description: Canceling your subscription will limit your access to premium features. Your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period.

loss.premiumModels: Access to premium AI models and advanced capabilities

cancelSubscription.termsNotice: By confirming, you agree to the cancellation terms. You can reactivate your subscription at any time before it expires.

timeline.accessUntil: You'll retain full access to all premium features until {date}
timeline.downgrade: After your subscription ends, your account will automatically downgrade to the free tier
timeline.immediate: No further charges will be made to your account
timeline.title: Cancellation Timeline:

cancelSubscription.title: Cancel Your Subscription?
cancelSubscription.warning: Are you absolutely sure you want to cancel?

billing.noPlansForInterval: No plans available for this billing period

products.description: Browse and subscribe to available products
products.title: Available Products

status.canceledTooltip: Your subscription will be canceled on {date}. You'll retain full access to all premium features until then, after which your account will automatically downgrade to the free tier.
status.endOfPeriod: the end of your billing period

success.confirmingPayment: Please wait while we confirm your payment
success.title: Payment Successful!

chat.addedToFavoritesDescription: Thread has been added to your favorites
chat.copyFailedDescription: Could not copy link to clipboard. Please try again.
chat.deleteThreadConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The thread and all its messages will be permanently deleted.

editMessage.description: Edit your message and regenerate AI responses based on the new prompt
editMessage.title: Edit Message

error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

public.threadNotFoundDescription: This public chat thread doesn't exist or has been made private.
public.noMessagesDescription: This conversation hasn't started yet. Create your own multi-AI chat!
public.description: lets you chat with multiple AI models simultaneously for deeper insights and better solutions.

chat.favoriteFailedDescription: Could not update favorite status. Please try again.

input.helperText: Press Enter to send, Shift + Enter for new line
input.streamingHelperText: AI is responding... Click stop button to interrupt

chat.madePrivateDescription: Only you can view this thread
chat.madePublicDescription: Anyone with the link can now view this thread
chat.makePublicConfirmDescription: Anyone with the link will be able to view this thread and its messages.
chat.publicToggleFailedDescription: Could not update thread visibility. Please try again.

brainstorm.description: Generate creative solutions with multiple AI perspectives
brainstorm.prompt: Help me brainstorm innovative ideas for improving team collaboration in remote work environments
brainstorm.title: Brainstorm Ideas

debate.description: Explore different perspectives on complex issues
debate.prompt: Debate the ethical implications of AI in healthcare decision-making
debate.title: Debate Topics

solve.prompt: Help me solve technical challenges in building a scalable microservices architecture
solve.title: Solve Problems

chat.removedFromFavoritesDescription: Thread has been removed from your favorites
chat.shareThreadDescription: Share this link with anyone to give them access to this thread
chat.threadCreationFailed: Failed to create chat thread. Please try again.
chat.threadDeleteFailedDescription: Could not delete the chat thread. Please try again.
chat.threadDeletedDescription: The chat thread has been successfully deleted
chat.threadNotFoundDescription: The chat thread you're looking for doesn't exist
chat.updateFailedDescription: Could not update the thread. Please try again.

changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy

children.content: Our service is not directed to individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
children.title: 7. Children's Privacy

collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, subscribe to a service, or contact us for support.
collection.title: 1. Information We Collect

contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at hello@roundtable.now.
contact.title: 9. Contact Us

cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information to improve and analyze our service.
cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking

rights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also opt-out of certain communications from us.
rights.title: 6. Your Rights

security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
security.title: 4. Data Security

sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this Privacy Policy.
sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing

usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.
usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information

acceptance.content: By accessing and using this service, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms

billing.content: You agree to pay all fees and charges incurred in connection with your use of the service. We reserve the right to change our fees at any time with prior notice.
billing.title: 3. Billing and Payments

contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at hello@roundtable.now.
contact.title: 8. Contact Information

governing.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which the company is established, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
governing.title: 7. Governing Law

liability.content: In no event shall Roundtable, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.
liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability

privacy.content: Your use of our service is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs the site and informs users of our data collection practices.
privacy.title: 4. Privacy Policy

services.content: This service is provided to help you manage your billing and subscriptions. You may use this service for lawful purposes only and in accordance with these Terms.
services.title: 2. Use of Service

termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, under our sole discretion, for any reason whatsoever.
termination.title: 5. Termination

notFound.description: The page you were looking for could not be found. Please check the URL or try navigating back to the homepage.
notFound.title: Oops, page not found!

modal.description: Choose the perfect plan for your needs
modal.title: Pricing & Plans

empty.description: There is no data to display at the moment.

error.description: There was an error processing your request.
error.networkDescription: Unable to connect to the server. Please try again.
error.offlineDescription: Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.timeoutDescription: The request took too long to complete. Please try again.
error.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

loading.please_wait: Please wait while we fetch your data...

subscription.planChangeInfo: Upgrades apply instantly. Downgrades take effect at period end.
